nodes.text: Gamorrean Protocol was a RPG scenario released by the RPGA for play at the 2000 Gen Con Game Fair.

A Rebel mission team is lost on the planet Gamorr, and Alliance HQ needs you to go get them out. Imperial involvement may be possible, though the Imps are not known to use Gamorr for anything at all. Who would? Characters provided. Standard RPGA experience.
